awd_titl_txt: Computer Mathematical Analysis of Nonlinear Problems in     Engineering Science
awd_abstract_narration: The objective of this Small Grants for Exploratory                              Research (SGER) is to initiate the development of                               new methods to analyze and solve engineering                                    problems using computer mathematical systems such                               as MATHEMATICA for the computer extension and                                   analysis of perturbation series.  These methods will                            be applied to problems in fluid-structural interaction.                         On of the main problems to be tested will be the                                motion of red blood cells which is a well known but                             difficult to solve free boundaries are encountered, e.g.                        phase transition during crystal growth and convection                           induced mass transport.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems
